meanings.sent1: The unworking machine sat silently in the corner.
meanings.sent2: The broken clock was unworking and showed the wrong time.
meanings.sent3: The unworking toaster decided to take a break from making toast.
meanings.sent4: Her unworking laptop was like a silent companion in the room.
meanings.sent5: The unworking car engine made a loud clunking noise.

meanings.definition: Not producing the desired or expected results
meanings.sent1: The unworking plan led to confusion among the team.
meanings.sent2: His unworking efforts left the project incomplete.
meanings.sent3: The unworking recipe resulted in a strange-tasting cake.
meanings.sent4: Her unworking attempts at painting left the canvas a mess.
meanings.sent5: The unworking strategy caused more problems than solutions.

meanings.sent1: The unworking elevator forced everyone to take the stairs.
meanings.sent2: The unworking phone line made communication difficult.
meanings.sent3: The unworking remote control seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: The unworking printer refused to cooperate with any commands.
meanings.sent5: The unworking light switch left the room in darkness.
